DESCRIPTION.name: Ankh
DESCRIPTION.description: A symbol of life after death

DESCRIPTION.name: Book of the Dead
DESCRIPTION.description: Your guidebook to the world after this one

DESCRIPTION.name: Crystal Skull
DESCRIPTION.description: Left behind by unknown visitors

DESCRIPTION.name: Jewels
DESCRIPTION.description: Precious Jewels are as Cheap Glass...

DESCRIPTION.name: Key
DESCRIPTION.description: Grants passage, but where to?

DESCRIPTION.name: Torch
DESCRIPTION.description: Where you are headed, there may be little light...

DESCRIPTION.name: Bag of Sekh
DESCRIPTION.description: Filthy Lucre will only take you so far...

DESCRIPTION.name: Rod of Leadership
DESCRIPTION.description: A symbol of the rule of the Pharoahs

DESCRIPTION.name: Crook
DESCRIPTION.description: A symbol of the rule of the Pharoahs, of Shepherds and Osiris

DESCRIPTION.name: Cat
DESCRIPTION.description: A dispassionate companion in both life and death

DESCRIPTION.name: Abacus
DESCRIPTION.description: A tool for senior architects

DESCRIPTION.name: Asp
DESCRIPTION.description: You have an asp. Why do you have an asp?

DESCRIPTION.name: Asp
DESCRIPTION.description: You have a cobra. Why do you have a cobra?

DESCRIPTION.name: Beer
DESCRIPTION.description: Liquid bread. Kept them from starving, and knocked them out at night, so they wouldn't be inclined to insurrection.

DESCRIPTION.name: Bow
DESCRIPTION.description: A weapon. Requires a quiver for effective use...

DESCRIPTION.name: Flatbread
DESCRIPTION.description: An essential foodstuff

DESCRIPTION.name: Carpenter's Tools
DESCRIPTION.description: A hammer and saw, for construction labourers

DESCRIPTION.name: Coins
DESCRIPTION.description: Filthy Lucre will only take you so far in these worlds...

DESCRIPTION.name: Dagger
DESCRIPTION.description: A deseperate weapon, easy to conceal and carry

DESCRIPTION.name: Dates
DESCRIPTION.description: An essential foodstuff, buried alongside the dead to sustain them in the afterlife

DESCRIPTION.name: Djed
DESCRIPTION.description: A pillar of support, for the afterlife. Because your spine is removed upon mummification

DESCRIPTION.name: Embalmed Slave
DESCRIPTION.description: Your faithful servant, even in death...

DESCRIPTION.name: Embalming Tools
DESCRIPTION.description: Used for the mummification of the dead.

DESCRIPTION.name: Geometer's Tools
DESCRIPTION.description: Set Square and Protractor, for an Architect

DESCRIPTION.name: Gold Bar
DESCRIPTION.description: A bar of solid gold...

DESCRIPTION.name: Pharoah's Headdress
DESCRIPTION.description: The nile is your domain, now and forever...

DESCRIPTION.name: Ink and Quill
DESCRIPTION.description: For recording notes

DESCRIPTION.name: Canopic Jar: Intestines
DESCRIPTION.description: A jar containing vital organs. Yummy Sausages

DESCRIPTION.name: Canopic Jar: Liver
DESCRIPTION.description: A jar containing vital organs. Eww

DESCRIPTION.name: Canopic Jar: Lungs
DESCRIPTION.description: A jar containing vital organs. Squick

DESCRIPTION.name: Canopic Jar: Stomach
DESCRIPTION.description: A jar containing vital organs. Yack

DESCRIPTION.name: Papyrus
DESCRIPTION.description: Writing Material, made of reeds

DESCRIPTION.name: Plough
DESCRIPTION.description: A tool for tilling the fields. We shall all till the fields in Osiris' garden...

DESCRIPTION.name: Quiver of Arrows
DESCRIPTION.description: A Quiver of Arrows. Requires a bow to be effective...

DESCRIPTION.name: Red Herring
DESCRIPTION.description: It looks delicious.

DESCRIPTION.name: Reeds and Bullrushes
DESCRIPTION.description: For making Papyrus, or hiding babies in

DESCRIPTION.name: Rudder
DESCRIPTION.description: An oar for steering a river vessel, both on the Nile and the Styx

DESCRIPTION.name: Scarab Broach
DESCRIPTION.description: A symbol of luck, for it pushes the sun across the sky...

DESCRIPTION.name: A Slave
DESCRIPTION.description: An exceedingly loyal member of the serving caste

DESCRIPTION.name: Staff of Command
DESCRIPTION.description: A badge of office for the mighty ruling caste

DESCRIPTION.name: Sword
DESCRIPTION.description: A weapon, for coming battles ahead

DESCRIPTION.name: U.F.O.
DESCRIPTION.description: We have no idea either...

DESCRIPTION.name: Water
DESCRIPTION.description: Blessed is the Nile, for it gives you life

DESCRIPTION.name: Watermelon
DESCRIPTION.description: A fruit cultivated along the Nile

DESCRIPTION.name: Chariot
DESCRIPTION.description: Your own war chariot, my leige. May it serve you well
